name: Santa Baby
description:
Steal presents, throw them at snowmen, jump! Made during a 48 hour game jam. There was no theme, but it was close to Christmas at the time so we ran with that.

Team: Baron Capers(Art),  Mac Orchard(Code), John Hawley(Code)

Controls: Arrows to move, cntrl/alt to pull a present out of sack, cntrl to throw present, alt to make the present bigger and more powerful!

Grab presents, defeat snowmen, and jump to your get-away sleigh!

Git Repo: https://github.com/jh318/DMIGameJam2016
